price: 86. Kaadu yi-abbah dambi cab, diggah usuk makkoote marak numuk teynah sugek.
arabic: وَٱغۡفِرۡ لِأَبِيٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-igh'fir li-abī innahu kāna mina al-ḍālīna
